Customize UI Kit/index.title: Customize UI Kit
Customize UI Kit/index.description: This guide helps you to customize, modify, and enable/disable features present in UIKit.

Overview/index.title: Overview
Overview/index.description: The CometChat Android Kotlin UI Kit is developed to keep developers in mind and aims to reduce development efforts significantly.

Overview/Message Structure and Hierarchy.title: Message Structure and Hierarchy
Overview/Message Structure and Hierarchy.description: The below diagram helps you better understand the various message categories and types that a CometChat message can belong to.

UI Components/index.title: UI Components
UI Components/index.description: UI Components are building a block of the UI Kit. UI Components are a set of custom classes specially designed to build a feature-rich chat app.  To achieve high customizability while building an app one can use the UI Components. There are different UI Components available in the UI Kit library.
